channel.title: Secure issue with website
channel.description: Currently working on a file hosting website and most of it done however there is a issue, lets say a user registers a folder is then made inside users with that persons username now any time that person uploads to there account its stored in there folder. however anyone can access it by typing in the url like www.websiteurl.com/abby/ and then they can see all the files in that directory, How can i prevent this?

item.title: Secure issue with website
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:549668”]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.htaccess[/quote]Use this, or maybe mod_rewrite could be of use to you

Read full topic

item.title: Secure issue with website
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Place a blank index.html file in each directory.
